```{r, import}
nuclear <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-08-20/nuclear_explosions.csv")

library(ggplot2)

```


```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
head(nuclear)

2ggplot(nuclear,
       aes(x = year,
           y = type)) +
  geom_point()

unique(nuclear$country)

```
